tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes_count INT
);
